Welcome in our application !
 Palette v2.1

 TRANSFORMATION MODE
 - Use the camera or take directly a picture from gallery to modify it.
 - The app will extract for you a good starting palette of color.
 - You can now change one color to another by clicking on it and observe the whole transformation
 - If the palette is not good enough for you, you can edit it using the pen.

 EDIT MODE
 - Edit a color by clicking on it
 - Select a color in the picture with a long click on it
 - add a new color with +
 - remove a color by sweeping it right
 - the magic want will extract a palette for you
 - validate or cancel you modification to switch back in transformation mode
